Step 417: Add to: TankRU01 (TankRU01Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU01Controller.cs) to "TankRU01"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU01 (Rigidbody)



TankRU01 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU01 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 418: Add to: TankRU01Camera (TankRU01Camera.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU01Camera.cs) to "TankRU01Camera"

Adjust Settings:

Transforms:
-----------

Tank RU: TankRU01 (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 419: Add to: TankUS (TankRU01TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU01TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU01"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU01 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU01 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 420: Add to: TankRU01 (TankRU01Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU01Entry.cs) to "TankRU01"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU01
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU01_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 421: In Interface > Canvas create empty child: "VehiclesSpeed"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "VehiclesSpeed"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Bottom Left

Pos X: 146.3
Pos Y: 143

Width: 300
Height: 300


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 422: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU01Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU01Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 423: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU01_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU01_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 424: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU01_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU01_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260



In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 425: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU01_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU01_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 426: In Vehicle > TankRU01 attach script: (TankRU01Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU01Speedometer script: (TankRU01Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU01"

In: "TankRU01" > TankRU01 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU01_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU01_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU01_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU01_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU01_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU01_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU01Speedometer
TankRU01_SpeedoGuage
TankRU01_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU01_SpeedText



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 427:  Create child of "VehiclesEntry" add Text tmp: "TankRU02_EntryKey"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create as a child of "VehiclesEntry" add TextMeshPro Text: "TankRU02_EntryKey"

Layer: "UI"


Rect Transform: 
---------------

Set at "Top Center"

Position: X: 0 Y: -50   Z: 0 
Width: 100
Height: 100


Text Input: Drive [E]
Font Size: 36

Alignment: Center & Middle

Face:
-----
Dilate: 0.21

Outline: Yes Thickness: 0.121

Underlay: Yes Softness: 0.522

Note: The face, outline and underlay are merely starting suggestions that you
can tweak further to your desired likings as well as any other related
settings of the likes.

Note: Lastly, disable this object as we do not want this to display prior to
awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by default
and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive item in
start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable this
object in the editor.

Ok, now that this part is done we can start moving to other setup steps...


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 428: Identify: the next "Vehicle Prefab"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Let us first identify and locate the "Vehicle Prefab" we are going to use.

Assets > PolygonBattleRoyale > Prefabs > Vehicles

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 429: Add: the next "Vehicle Prefab" to Scene

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Drag the mentioned "Vehicle Prefab" into the scene & unpack the prefab completely.

Next, rename the vehicle prefabs:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01 => "TankRU02"

Next, set the Transform:

Position: X: 65 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Material: PolygonBattleRoyale_Veh_02

Then move "TankRU02" into the empty: "Vehicles" as child of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 430: Add: empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU02" add empty as child named "View"

Set the Transform of "View":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 431: Add: "Camera" in empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In the empty: "View" add "Camera" component named: "TankRU02Camera"

Tag: Untagged

Depth: 0

Set the Transform of "TankRU02Camera":

Position: X: 0 Y: 2.8 Z: -8.4 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 432: Add: empty "WheelMeshes" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU02" add empty as child named "WheelMeshes"

Set the Transform of "WheelMeshes":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

(delete originals after as they are not needed since we copied them into new
location)

Step 433: Duplicate: empty "WheelMeshes" as "WheelColliders"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU02" duplicate "WheelMeshes" & rename to "WheelColliders"

Set the Transform of "WheelColliders":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Since you duplicated "WheelMeshes" & renamed to "WheelColliders" there should
be the children already present with matching infos...

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07

Right:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Prior to the deletion of contents in WheelColliders if you desired to
determine the wheel radius so as to eventually use with Wheel Colliders well,
you could attach a Sphere Collider and gain Radius from that and then delete
the sphere collider after as such would no longer be necessary but instead to
avoid needing to do such I will provide that info so you do not necessarily
need to do so.

These details are important:

* Wheel colliders need +0.15 on the Y to function as intended as per
  documentation

In "WheelColliders" children: * (since all are already present in WheelMeshes
and not needed for Wheel Colliders)

* Delete Mesh Filter
* Delete Mesh Renderer

Add Component "Wheel Collider" to each:

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07

Right:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07

----------------------

-----------------------------------

Step 434: Add to: TankRU02 (TankRU02Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU02Controller.cs) to "TankRU02"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU02 (Rigidbody)



TankRU02 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU02 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 435: Add to: TankRU02Camera (TankRU02Camera.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU02Camera.cs) to "TankRU02Camera"

Adjust Settings:

Transforms:
-----------

Tank RU: TankRU02 (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 436: Add to: TankUS (TankRU02TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU02TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU02"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU02 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU02 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 437: Add to: TankRU02 (TankRU02Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU02Entry.cs) to "TankRU02"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU02
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU02_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 438: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU02Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU02Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 439: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU02_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU02_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 440: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU02_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU02_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 441: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU02_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU02_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 442: In Vehicles > TankRU02 attach script: (TankRU02Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU02Speedometer script: (TankRU02Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU02"

In: "TankRU02" > TankRU02 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU02_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU02_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU02_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU02_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU02_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU02_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU02Speedometer
TankRU02_SpeedoGuage
TankRU02_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU02_SpeedText


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 443:  Create child of "VehiclesEntry" add Text tmp: "TankRU03_EntryKey"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create as a child of "VehiclesEntry" add TextMeshPro Text: "TankRU03_EntryKey"

Layer: "UI"


Rect Transform: 
---------------

Set at "Top Center"

Position: X: 0 Y: -50   Z: 0 
Width: 100
Height: 100


Text Input: Drive [E]
Font Size: 36

Alignment: Center & Middle

Face:
-----
Dilate: 0.21

Outline: Yes Thickness: 0.121

Underlay: Yes Softness: 0.522

Note: The face, outline and underlay are merely starting suggestions that you
can tweak further to your desired likings as well as any other related
settings of the likes.

Note: Lastly, disable this object as we do not want this to display prior to
awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by default
and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive item in
start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable this
object in the editor.

Ok, now that this part is done we can start moving to other setup steps...


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 444: Identify: the next "Vehicle Prefab"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Let us first identify and locate the "Vehicle Prefab" we are going to use.

Assets > PolygonBattleRoyale > Prefabs > Vehicles

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 445: Add: the next "Vehicle Prefab" to Scene

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Drag the mentioned "Vehicle Prefab" into the scene & unpack the prefab completely.

Next, rename the vehicle prefabs:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01 => "TankRU03"

Next, set the Transform:

Position: X: 73 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Material: PolygonBattleRoyale_Veh_03

Then move "TankRU03" into the empty: "Vehicles" as child of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 446: Add: empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU03" add empty as child named "View"

Set the Transform of "View":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 447: Add: "Camera" in empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In the empty: "View" add "Camera" component named: "TankRU03Camera"

Tag: Untagged

Depth: 0

Set the Transform of "TankRU03Camera":

Position: X: 0 Y: 2.8 Z: -8.4 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 449: Duplicate: empty "WheelMeshes" as "WheelColliders"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU03" duplicate "WheelMeshes" & rename to "WheelColliders"

Set the Transform of "WheelColliders":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Since you duplicated "WheelMeshes" & renamed to "WheelColliders" there should
be the children already present with matching infos...

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Prior to the deletion of contents in WheelColliders if you desired to
determine the wheel radius so as to eventually use with Wheel Colliders well,
you could attach a Sphere Collider and gain Radius from that and then delete
the sphere collider after as such would no longer be necessary but instead to
avoid needing to do such I will provide that info so you do not necessarily
need to do so.

These details are important:

* Wheel colliders need +0.15 on the Y to function as intended as per
  documentation

In "WheelColliders" children: * (since all are already present in WheelMeshes
and not needed for Wheel Colliders)

* Delete Mesh Filter
* Delete Mesh Renderer

Add Component "Wheel Collider" to each:

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Wheel Collider Radius:
----------------------

Left:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3202184
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Right:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3202184
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45

Step 450: Add to: TankRU03 (TankRU03Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU03Controller.cs) to "TankRU03"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU03 (Rigidbody)



TankRU03 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU03 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000

Attach component / script (TankRU03Camera.cs) to "TankRU03Camera"

Adjust Settings:

Transforms:
-----------

Tank RU: TankRU03 (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 452: Add to: TankUS (TankRU03TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU03TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU03"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU03 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU03 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 453: Add to: TankRU03 (TankRU03Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU03Entry.cs) to "TankRU03"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU03
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU03_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 454: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU03Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU03Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 455: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU03_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU03_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 456: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU03_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU03_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 457: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU03_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU03_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 458: In Vehicles > TankRU03 attach script: (TankRU03Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU03Speedometer script: (TankRU03Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU03"

In: "TankRU03" > TankRU03 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU03_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU03_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU03_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU03_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU03_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU03_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU03Speedometer
TankRU03_SpeedoGuage
TankRU03_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU03_SpeedText

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 459:  Create child of "VehiclesEntry" add Text tmp: "TankRU04_EntryKey"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create as a child of "VehiclesEntry" add TextMeshPro Text: "TankRU04_EntryKey"

Layer: "UI"


Rect Transform: 
---------------

Set at "Top Center"

Position: X: 0 Y: -50   Z: 0 
Width: 100
Height: 100


Text Input: Drive [E]
Font Size: 36

Alignment: Center & Middle

Face:
-----
Dilate: 0.21

Outline: Yes Thickness: 0.121

Underlay: Yes Softness: 0.522

Note: The face, outline and underlay are merely starting suggestions that you
can tweak further to your desired likings as well as any other related
settings of the likes.

Note: Lastly, disable this object as we do not want this to display prior to
awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by default
and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive item in
start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable this
object in the editor.

Ok, now that this part is done we can start moving to other setup steps...


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 460: Identify: the next "Vehicle Prefab"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Let us first identify and locate the "Vehicle Prefab" we are going to use.

Assets > PolygonBattleRoyale > Prefabs > Vehicles

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 461: Add: the next "Vehicle Prefab" to Scene

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Drag the mentioned "Vehicle Prefab" into the scene & unpack the prefab completely.

Next, rename the vehicle prefabs:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01 => "TankRU04"

Next, set the Transform:

Position: X: 81 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Material: PolygonBattleRoyale_Veh_04

Then move "TankRU04" into the empty: "Vehicles" as child of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 462: Add: empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU04" add empty as child named "View"

Set the Transform of "View":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 463: Add: "Camera" in empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In the empty: "View" add "Camera" component named: "TankRU04Camera"

Tag: Untagged

Depth: 0

Set the Transform of "TankRU04Camera":

Position: X: 0 Y: 2.8 Z: -8.4 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Since you duplicated "WheelMeshes" & renamed to "WheelColliders" there should
be the children already present with matching infos...

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Prior to the deletion of contents in WheelColliders if you desired to
determine the wheel radius so as to eventually use with Wheel Colliders well,
you could attach a Sphere Collider and gain Radius from that and then delete
the sphere collider after as such would no longer be necessary but instead to
avoid needing to do such I will provide that info so you do not necessarily
need to do so.

These details are important:

* Wheel colliders need +0.15 on the Y to function as intended as per
  documentation

In "WheelColliders" children: * (since all are already present in WheelMeshes
and not needed for Wheel Colliders)

* Delete Mesh Filter
* Delete Mesh Renderer

Add Component "Wheel Collider" to each:

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01

----------------------

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Right:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088

Step 466: Add to: TankRU04 (TankRU04Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU04Controller.cs) to "TankRU04"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU04 (Rigidbody)



TankRU04 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU04 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000

Step 468: Add to: TankUS (TankRU04TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU04TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU04"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU04 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU04 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 469: Add to: TankRU04 (TankRU04Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU04Entry.cs) to "TankRU04"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU04
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU04_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 470: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU04Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU04Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 471: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU04_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU04_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 472: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU04_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU04_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 473: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU04_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU04_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 474: In Vehicles > TankRU04 attach script: (TankRU04Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU04Speedometer script: (TankRU04Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU04"

In: "TankRU04" > TankRU04 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU04_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU04_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU04_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU04_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU04_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU04_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU04Speedometer
TankRU04_SpeedoGuage
TankRU04_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU04_SpeedText

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 475:  Create child of "VehiclesEntry" add Text tmp: "TankRU05_EntryKey"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create as a child of "VehiclesEntry" add TextMeshPro Text: "TankRU05_EntryKey"

Layer: "UI"


Rect Transform: 
---------------

Set at "Top Center"

Position: X: 0 Y: -50   Z: 0 
Width: 100
Height: 100


Text Input: Drive [E]
Font Size: 36

Alignment: Center & Middle

Face:
-----
Dilate: 0.21

Outline: Yes Thickness: 0.121

Underlay: Yes Softness: 0.522

Note: The face, outline and underlay are merely starting suggestions that you
can tweak further to your desired likings as well as any other related
settings of the likes.

Note: Lastly, disable this object as we do not want this to display prior to
awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by default
and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive item in
start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable this
object in the editor.

Ok, now that this part is done we can start moving to other setup steps...


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 476: Identify: the next "Vehicle Prefab"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Let us first identify and locate the "Vehicle Prefab" we are going to use.

Assets > PolygonBattleRoyale > Prefabs > Vehicles

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 477: Add: the next "Vehicle Prefab" to Scene

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Drag the mentioned "Vehicle Prefab" into the scene & unpack the prefab completely.

Next, rename the vehicle prefabs:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01 => "TankRU05"

Next, set the Transform:

Position: X: 88 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Material: PolygonBattleRoyale_Veh_05

Then move "TankRU05" into the empty: "Vehicles" as child of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 478: Add: empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU05" add empty as child named "View"

Set the Transform of "View":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 479: Add: "Camera" in empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In the empty: "View" add "Camera" component named: "TankRU05Camera"

Tag: Untagged

Depth: 0

Set the Transform of "TankRU05Camera":

Position: X: 0 Y: 2.8 Z: -8.4 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU05" duplicate "WheelMeshes" & rename to "WheelColliders"

Set the Transform of "WheelColliders":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Since you duplicated "WheelMeshes" & renamed to "WheelColliders" there should
be the children already present with matching infos...

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Prior to the deletion of contents in WheelColliders if you desired to
determine the wheel radius so as to eventually use with Wheel Colliders well,
you could attach a Sphere Collider and gain Radius from that and then delete
the sphere collider after as such would no longer be necessary but instead to
avoid needing to do such I will provide that info so you do not necessarily
need to do so.

These details are important:

* Wheel colliders need +0.15 on the Y to function as intended as per
  documentation

In "WheelColliders" children: * (since all are already present in WheelMeshes
and not needed for Wheel Colliders)

* Delete Mesh Filter
* Delete Mesh Renderer

Add Component "Wheel Collider" to each:

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02

----------------------

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Right:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3202184
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Step 482: Add to: TankRU05 (TankRU05Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU05Controller.cs) to "TankRU05"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU05 (Rigidbody)



TankRU05 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU05 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 483: Add to: TankRU05Camera (TankRU05Camera.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU05Camera.cs) to "TankRU05Camera"

Adjust Settings:

Transforms:
-----------

Tank RU: TankRU05 (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 484: Add to: TankUS (TankRU05TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU05TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU05"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU05 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU05 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 485: Add to: TankRU05 (TankRU05Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU05Entry.cs) to "TankRU05"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU05
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU05_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 486: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU05Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU05Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 487: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU05_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU05_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 488: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU05_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU05_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 489: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU05_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU05_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 490: In Vehicles > TankRU05 attach script: (TankRU05Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU05Speedometer script: (TankRU05Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU05"

In: "TankRU05" > TankRU05 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU05_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU05_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU05_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU05_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU05_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU05_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU05Speedometer
TankRU05_SpeedoGuage
TankRU05_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU05_SpeedText

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 491:  Create child of "VehiclesEntry" add Text tmp: "TankRU06_EntryKey"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Create as a child of "VehiclesEntry" add TextMeshPro Text: "TankRU06_EntryKey"

Layer: "UI"


Rect Transform: 
---------------

Set at "Top Center"

Position: X: 0 Y: -50   Z: 0 
Width: 100
Height: 100


Text Input: Drive [E]
Font Size: 36

Alignment: Center & Middle

Face:
-----
Dilate: 0.21

Outline: Yes Thickness: 0.121

Underlay: Yes Softness: 0.522

Note: The face, outline and underlay are merely starting suggestions that you
can tweak further to your desired likings as well as any other related
settings of the likes.

Note: Lastly, disable this object as we do not want this to display prior to
awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by default
and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive item in
start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable this
object in the editor.

Ok, now that this part is done we can start moving to other setup steps...


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 492: Identify: the next "Vehicle Prefab"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Let us first identify and locate the "Vehicle Prefab" we are going to use.

Assets > PolygonBattleRoyale > Prefabs > Vehicles

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 493: Add: the next "Vehicle Prefab" to Scene

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Drag the mentioned "Vehicle Prefab" into the scene & unpack the prefab completely.

Next, rename the vehicle prefabs:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_01 => "TankRU06"

Next, set the Transform:

Position: X: 95 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Material: PolygonBattleRoyale_Veh_06

Then move "TankRU06" into the empty: "Vehicles" as child of.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 494: Add: empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU06" add empty as child named "View"

Set the Transform of "View":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 495: Add: "Camera" in empty "View" as child

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In the empty: "View" add "Camera" component named: "TankRU06Camera"

Tag: Untagged

Depth: 0

Set the Transform of "TankRU06Camera":

Position: X: 0 Y: 2.8 Z: -8.4 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 497: Duplicate: empty "WheelMeshes" as "WheelColliders"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In "TankRU06" duplicate "WheelMeshes" & rename to "WheelColliders"

Set the Transform of "WheelColliders":

Position: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Rotation: X: 0 Y: 0 Z: 0 
Scale:    X: 1 Y: 1 Z: 1

Since you duplicated "WheelMeshes" & renamed to "WheelColliders" there should
be the children already present with matching infos...

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Prior to the deletion of contents in WheelColliders if you desired to
determine the wheel radius so as to eventually use with Wheel Colliders well,
you could attach a Sphere Collider and gain Radius from that and then delete
the sphere collider after as such would no longer be necessary but instead to
avoid needing to do such I will provide that info so you do not necessarily
need to do so.

These details are important:

* Wheel colliders need +0.15 on the Y to function as intended as per
  documentation

In "WheelColliders" children: * (since all are already present in WheelMeshes
and not needed for Wheel Colliders)

* Delete Mesh Filter
* Delete Mesh Renderer

Add Component "Wheel Collider" to each:

Left:

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02
SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03

SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07


Wheel Collider Radius:
----------------------

Left:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3202184
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

Right:

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3202184
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.4486088
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 "Wheel Collider" radius: 0.3966376

-----------------------------------

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.17

Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.45
Set SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 "Wheel Collider" Suspension Distance: 0.17

Step 498: Add to: TankRU06 (TankRU06Controller.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU06Controller.cs) to "TankRU06"

Adjust the following settings:

Require Components:
-------------------

Rigidbody: TankRU06 (Rigidbody)



TankRU06 Transforms:
------------------

Tank RU Body: TankRU06 (Transform)
Tank RU Turret: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_01 (Transform)
Tank RU Barrel: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Turret_Barrel_01 (Transform)


Wheel Transforms:
-----------------

Left01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Transform)
Left02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Transform)
Left03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Transform)
Left04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Transform)
Left05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Transform)
Left06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Transform)
Left07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Transform)


Right01 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Transform)
Right02 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Transform)
Right03 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Transform)
Right04 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Transform)
Right05 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Transform)
Right06 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Transform)
Right07 Transform: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Transform)



WheelColliders:
---------------


Left01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_01 (Wheel Collider)
Left02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_02 (Wheel Collider)
Left03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_03 (Wheel Collider)
Left04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_04 (Wheel Collider)
Left05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_05 (Wheel Collider)
Left06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_06 (Wheel Collider)
Left07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_L_07 (Wheel Collider)


Right01: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_01 (Wheel Collider)
Right02: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_02 (Wheel Collider)
Right03: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_03 (Wheel Collider)
Right04: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_04 (Wheel Collider)
Right05: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_05 (Wheel Collider)
Right06: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_06 (Wheel Collider)
Right07: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_Wheel_R_07 (Wheel Collider)


In Rigidbody:
-------------

Set Rigibody Mass: 7000

Transforms:

Step 500: Add to: TankUS (TankRU06TrackScrolling.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU06TrackScrolling.cs) to "TankRU06"

Adjust Settings:


TankRU06 Rigidbody :
------------------

TankRU06 (Rigidbody)

Track Scrolling:
----------------

Scroll Speed: 0.05
Invert: NO

Track Renderers:
----------------

Track L: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_L (Transform)
Track R: SM_Veh_Tank_Russia_Track_R (Transform)


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 501: Add to: TankRU06 (TankRU06Entry.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach component / script (TankRU06Entry.cs) to "TankRU06"

Adjust the following settings:


Game Objects:
-------------

Tank US: TankRU06
Player: Player
Interface Text Object: TankRU06_EntryKey


In Box Collider:
----------------

Is Trigger: Yes

Edit Collider: YES!* 

* Edit the collider to be around the vehicle making sure to extend the
  collider a good bit out away from such so as to allow for a good trigger
  zone. Here is just an example that I suggest you tweak further to you
  likings and needs:

Center: X: -0.3847775 Y: 1.137009 Z: -0.2547669
Size: X: 5.877605 Y: 1.871178 Z: 8.895684


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 502: In "VehiclesSpeed" create empty child: "TankRU06Speedometer"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU06Speedometer"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300

* something to note on placement: ok, when you add the script later in steps
  you will notice an option in script settings for setting on choice of
  either kph or mph in regards to SpeedText output, ok, with taking that into
  account you can now possibly understand the following note about placement
  of the interface items specific to such, mkay lets say that these setup
  steps suggest setting all on the bottom left and that is because we are
  using mph for the speed text outputdisplay thus such would make sence to
  have speedometer and speed text on left bottom, but, ok, say you select kph
  as speed text output, then it just might make sence to set the interface
  items to the bottom right and that is why these suggestions are mentioned.
  The choice is yours on that.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 503: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add UI IMG: "TankRU06_SpeedoGuage"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU06_SpeedoGuage"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Width: 300
Height: 300


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Guage

Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 504: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add IMG: "TankRU06_SpeedoNeedle"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU06_SpeedoNeedle"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -24

Width: 260
Height: 260


In: "Image"


Source Image: Speedometer-Needle

Color: (Suggested Hex) 6B3232


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 505: In Interface > Canvas > VehiclesSpeed add TMP TEXT: "TankRU06_SpeedText"

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


In: "TankRU06_SpeedText"

Adjust:

Rect Transform:
---------------

Middle Center

Pos Y: -120.4

Width: 200
Height: 50

Text Input:
-----------

0 mph


Font Size: 36 *

Vertex Color: (Suggested Hex) 3A3E37

Alignment: Center Middle

Face:
Dilate: 0.21 *

Outline: YES
Thickness: 0.121 *

Underlay: YES
Dilate: 0.02 *
Softness: 0.522 *

* Note these are just suggestions for you then to tweak and adjust further to
  your likings.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Step 506: In Vehicles > TankRU06 attach script: (TankRU06Speedometer.cs)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attach TankRU06Speedometer script: (TankRU06Speedometer.cs) to
Vehicle: "TankRU06"

In: "TankRU06" > TankRU06 Speedometer (Script)

Adjust the minimal settings as far as what is min needed: (Needle IMG and
Speed Text)

Needle: TankRU06_Needle

Speet Text: TankRU06_SpeedText (Text Mesh Pro UGUI)

Interface Parent Object: TankRU06_Speedometer
Interface IMG01 Object: TankRU06_SpeedoGuage
Interface IMG02 Object: TankRU06_SpeedoNeedle
Interface Text Object: TankRU06_SpeedText


Note: Lastly,  we need to disable
the listed objects found below as we do not want these objects to display
prior to awake or start methods and to do this we will disable this object by
default and then there is a wrapper in the script that will find the inactive
item in start thus doing what will be needed. So yeah, make sure to disable
these objects in the editor.

Game Objects:

TankRU06Speedometer
TankRU06_SpeedoGuage
TankRU06_SpeedoNeedle
TankRU06_SpeedText


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

That should about sum it up and should be about it and concludes the basic
All Vehicle Controllers in scene manual setup steps. You can
now begin to modify such further for your specific needs.
